ud2.8:1.2: kuṇḍikāyaṁ → kuṇḍiyāyaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | kuṇḍadhānavane → kuṇḍiṭṭhānavane (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
ud2.8:5.4: saha vacanā ca pana → saha vacanā pana (pts-vp-pli1); saha vacanā (?)
ud2.8:9.8: pacchā tvaṁ karissasī’ti → pacchā so karissati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1); karissasīti saññāpehi (mr)
ud2.8:11.3: Dvinnaṁ kho te ahaṁ → dvinnaṁ kho tesaṁ (pts-vp-pli1); dvinnaṁ kho nesaṁ (mr)
